content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
No new structures have been successfully placed on the map. Multiple attempts were made to supply a Lab at position (0.5, 2.5) for Automation Science Pack research; however, placement and crafting failed due to missing inventory and resource shortages. No other structural assemblies were created during these steps.

ERROR TIPS
• API Parameter Usage – When calling get_entities, ensure that the provided arguments match the API’s requirements. Avoid using unexpected keywords (e.g., "radius") and confirm whether the call should be made with positional arguments only.
• Retrieval and Iteration Handling – Before iterating over the result of get_entities, validate that it is not None (or substitute an empty list) to prevent TypeError issues.
• Placement Prerequisites – Verify that the desired structure (e.g. Lab) is available in your inventory before attempting placement at a designated position.
• Crafting Resource Management – Confirm that all sub-ingredients required for lab crafting (such as iron-gear-wheels, electronic-circuits, and copper-cables) are producible or sufficiently stocked. This also includes ensuring that prerequisite processes (like smelting for iron-plates and copper-plates) have been executed to yield enough resources for subsequent recipes.
